job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automatetasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer Internship

Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automatetasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing a proof of concept for an LLM, including data ingestion, training with custom information, and enabling question-answering capabilities. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and their application.

phrases: Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work
scripts that would automatetasks that software developers are performing
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development of software tools (scripts) to enhance the efficiency of other software developers, which falls under general software development practices.

phrases: Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline
train the LLM with our custom information
be able to ask questions to documents
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the process of working with and adapting Large Language Models (LLMs), including training them with specific data and enabling question-answering functionalities, which is a core aspect of generative AI modeling.
The collection and ingestion of documents are foundational steps in preparing data for training or fine-tuning LLMs, fitting within the scope of data engineering for AI projects.

phrases: Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader
gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment
practical guidance from experts in the field
work in and experience a dynamic team environment
